bug.author: Deathn0t
bug.description: The starting point defined in an HpProblem should be added to the first batch of evaluations during AMBS. See this line: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deephyper/deephyper/blob/master/deephyper/search/hps/ambs.py#L75>https://github.com/deephyper/deephyper/blob/master/deephyper/search/hps/ambs.py#L75</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Now able to use multiple starting points in AMBS.
